TEXT: You feel the magic flow through your magic circuits as you blast the tower heart in your powerful zwei form.
You stumble across a group of shady lolicons.  They ask you to join in their ritual...
You feel the magic emanate from within as you unleash the strongest Unlimited Blade Works you can muster onto the tower heart.
You stumble across a group of shady lolicons.  They ask you to join in their ritual...
You feel the magic grow inside you as you blast the tower heart with all you've got.
